name: nanab-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Cuteness. Its pink flesh is sweet when eaten.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Cuteness. Its pink flesh is sweet when eaten.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A Berry that calms wild Pokémon you’re trying to catch slightly when given to them.
